name: ORS DTO Rising 18s
description:
This is an operational report listing all prisoners aged between 17 years 4 months and 19 years 11 months for a single establishment. It will be used to identify prisoners who are serving a Detention and Training Order sentence (DTO) who are approaching 18 years of age or who are over 18.
PDD0003 - v00.01.00 Last Modified: 26/01/09

dataset.name: Rising 18's
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE, CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) AS AGE_IN_MONTHS, CASE WHEN (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION) END AS AREA, CASE WHEN DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE END AS MTD_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_CITY, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.CITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.COUNTY_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN = 'COUNTY' OR AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) <= 239 AND TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) >= 208 AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS <> 'TRN' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CALC_TYPE = 'DTO' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_STATUS = 'A' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME') UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE, CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) AS AGE_IN_MONTHS, CASE WHEN (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION) END AS AREA, CASE WHEN DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE END AS MTD_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_CITY, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.CITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.COUNTY_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN = 'COUNTY' OR AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS <> 'TRN' AND CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) <= 239 AND TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) >= 208 AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CALC_TYPE = 'DTO' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_STATUS = 'A' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME' AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y')) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE, CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) AS AGE_IN_MONTHS, '' AS AREA, CASE WHEN DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE END AS MTD_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS <> 'TRN' AND CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) <= 239 AND TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) >= 208 AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CALC_TYPE = 'DTO' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_STATUS = 'A' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE <> 'HOME' AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME')) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE, CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) AS AGE_IN_MONTHS, '' AS AREA, CASE WHEN DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE END AS MTD_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS <> 'TRN' AND CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) <= 239 AND TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) >= 208 AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CALC_TYPE = 'DTO' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_STATUS = 'A' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID >= 0)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE, CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) AS AGE_IN_MONTHS, '' AS AREA, CASE WHEN DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE END AS MTD_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('TRN') AND CEIL((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) <= 239 AND TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE))) >= 208 AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_CALC_TYPE = 'DTO' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_STATUS = 'A' AND AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'N' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME' AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, INITIALS, BIRTH_DATE, AGE, AGE_IN_MONTHS, AREA, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, MTD_DATE, NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG, AGE || 'yrs ' || AGE_IN_MONTHS - NaN || 'mths' AS V_AGE, INITCAP(CASE WHEN NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'No fixed address' ELSE AREA END) AS V_AREA FROM dataset_base_)
